questions.question: What is the primary difference between supervised and unsupervised learning?
choices: Supervised learning uses labeled data, unsupervised learning does not
Unsupervised learning is faster than supervised learning
Supervised learning is only for classification tasks
Unsupervised learning requires more computational power

questions.question: Which algorithm is commonly used for classification tasks?
choices: Linear Regression
K-Means Clustering
Support Vector Machine (SVM)
Principal Component Analysis (PCA)

questions.question: What does overfitting mean in machine learning?
choices: The model performs poorly on both training and test data
The model performs well on training data but poorly on test data
The model takes too long to train
The model uses too many features

questions.question: Which of the following is a regularization technique used to prevent overfitting?
choices: Dropout
Data normalization
Feature scaling
Cross-validation

questions.question: What is the purpose of a confusion matrix?
choices: To normalize input features
To evaluate the performance of a classification model
To reduce the dimensionality of data
To generate synthetic training data
